column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My husband and I have come back to celebrate our anniversary here twice. This will continue to be our favorite location for special occasions. The food was outstanding
column2: our steaks (my filet and his 22oz ribeye) were made to perfection at a medium plus
column3: per the recommendation of our fantastic server named Brandon. The sides we chose were mashed potatoes and creamed spinach
column4: they were delicious. The blue cheese on the spinach was a plus along with the roasted garlic cloves on the potatoes. The oysters we had for appetizers were tasty however I prefer their East Coast option. Â My rye old fashioned was tasty
column5: however my husband's filthy dirty martini with blue cheese olives was the creme de la creme!
